channel.title: Editting Camelot on RS2 Map Editor by PeterBjorn
channel.description:
Hello. I've divided the base codes by 64, like his map editor stated, and I still get the same problem. It doesn't recognize that area, I guess. Any idea how to edit this area, or how I could fix this problem? The coords of the area I want to fool around on are:
X: 2758 Y: 3488
Note: I've modified the src with Oxygen's 377. Any ideas?

item.title: Editting Camelot on RS2 Map Editor by PeterBjorn
item.dc:creator: @GabberDaan GabberDaan
item.description:
@GabberDaan wrote:

well… the strange thing about that map editor is that you first have to enter the Y and then the X (instead like a ingame ::tele command where you first enter the X and then the Y)

so you said
X: 2758
Y: 3488

that would become

Y: 3488 / 64 = 54.5 so that would become 54
X: 2758 / 64 = 43.09 so that is 43

so in the editor you should put in “54 43”

i hope it works for you just as it works for me (:

Read full topic
item.source: Editting Camelot on RS2 Map Editor by PeterBjorn

item.title: Editting Camelot on RS2 Map Editor by PeterBjorn
item.dc:creator: @goldstylez goldstylez
item.description:
@goldstylez wrote:

do you know how to open the world?
i know that editor but i don’t know how to open the world to edit?

Read full topic
